title: Crime Alert 10.24.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.24.18
description:
Community is outraged after convicted child rapist moves to within a mile of the home where he victim was kidnapped. Did Trump adviser Roger Stone know about Wikileaks plan to release hacked Democratic emails before the election? Convicted murderer Molly Corbett says her conviction must be overturned.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
